Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Class Grid This class is used to create every player's grid
    Author:
    Luca Massini, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)
    See Also:

      • addDie

        public void addDie(Die die,
                   int row,
                   int column)
        Die Adder this method put the die that is passed as parameter in the matrixOfDice in the position(row, column)
        Parameters:
        die - is the die that must be passed to this method to be put in the grid in position(row, column)
        row - is the row coordinate of the grid of the placement of the die
        column - is the row coordinate of the grid of the placement of the die

      • isValidFirstTimePlacement

        public boolean isValidFirstTimePlacement(int row,
                                         int column)
        FirstPlacement Checker This Method is used to verify the correctness of the first placement
        Parameters:
        row - is the row coordinate of the reference die
        column - is the column coordinate of the reference die
        Returns:
        the boolean value of firstTime and the value of valid rows and column of the first placement

      • checkRules

        public boolean checkRules(int row,
                          int column,
                          Die die)
        Rules Checker This method returns true if all the placement rules have been Respected
        Parameters:
        row - is the row coordinate of the coordinate of the placement in the grid
        column - is the column coordinate of the placement of a die in the grid
        die - the die about which we have to do all checks
        Returns:
        true if all the rules except of the tool cards have been respected

      • getCardName

        public java.lang.String getCardName()
        CardName Getter This is a getter method for the attribute cardName that returns tha attribute cardName of the object
        Returns:
        the name of the SchemeCard that is contented in this class

      • setDie

        public void setDie(int row,
                   int column,
                   Die die)
            throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Die Setter This method is used to set a die into the MatrixOfDice
        Parameters:
        die - is the die that must be passed to this method to be put in the grid in position(row, column)
        row - is the row coordinate of the grid of the placement of the die "Die"
        column - is the row coordinate of the grid of the placement of the die "Die"
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - if is not possible to clone the die

      • gridToArrayListOfStrings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> gridToArrayListOfStrings()
        Grid Printer This method is used to print the grid
        Returns:
        an ArrayList in which the elements in even position (i) represent the String representation of the i-th row of the grid starting from the top. In the odd positions there are the separators between one row and the other
